column2: Job Description ?? Manage all finance and accounts related activities such as keeping complete records of accounts?? Prepare financial reports for P&L,  Cash flow etc.,  on a regular basis and keep the senior management informed?? Participate and manage vendor negotiations?? Process monthly payroll,  reimbursements and vendor payments?? Ensure that all monthly,  quarterly and annual compliances are completed from a VAT,  Income Tax and MCA point of view?? Coordinate with auditors and company secretary to get necessary work done Required skills ?? Previous experience in a similar role is a must?? Good oral and written communication skills?? Knowledge of book keeping packages such as Tally,  QuickBooks etc.,  is required??,250217500743.0,2017-02-25,2017-05-26,EducationalOccupationalCredential,24.0,Finance & Accounting,Accountant / Accounts Executive,Internet,Asst. Manager
